mythos.name: A Strange Plague
text: Investigators cannot gain Stamina except by receiving medical care in St. Mary's Hospital (or from Vincent Lee).

mythos.name: Alien Technology
text: Mig-Go have their toughness increased by 2. If an investigator passes a **Combat check** against a Mi-Go, he draws 1 extra Unique Item.

mythos.name: All Quite in Arkham
text: Each player may pass a **Lick (-1) check** to be *Blessed*

mythos.name: An Evil Fog
text: Will checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty
Sneak checks in aArkham are made at a +1 bonus.
Fliers do not move

mythos.name: Blackest Night
text: Luck checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.

mythos.name: Blood Magic
text: Investigators who end their movement in Rivertown streets may choose to delve into the dark mysteries using their life force. They roll dice equal to their current Stamina, and for every failed die they lose 1 Stamina. If this reduces them to 0 Stamina, they are **devoured** and the player must start a new character. Itherwise, they gain 3 Clue tokens.

mythos.name: Blue Flu!
text: All investigators in jail are released. No investigators may be *arrested* until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

mythos.name: Big Storm Sweeps Arkham!
text: All monster in the Sky and Outskirts are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Bizarre Dreams Plague Citizens!
text: All Gugs and Nightgaunts in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

mythos.name: Campus Security Increased!
text: All monsters in the Miskatonic U. streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Church Group Reclaims Southside!
text: All monsters in the Southside streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: City Gripped by Blackouts!
text: The General Store, Curiositie Shoppe, and Ye Olde Magick Shoppe are closed until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

mythos.name: Curfew Enforced
text: Any investigator who ends his movement in the streets must pass a **Will (+0) check** or be arrested and taken to the Police Station.

mythos.name: Darke's Carnival Arrives
text: Investigators who end their movement in the Northside streets gain 1 Clue token from the sinister wonders they witness, but must pass a **Will (-1) check** or lose 1 Sanity.

mythos.name: Disturbin the Dead
text: **Outgoing Effect**: Roll a die at the end of every **Mythos Phase** while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). On a 1 or 2, increase the terror level by 1.
**Pass**: If a single player discards 2 gate trophies during the **Arkham Encounter Phase** while in the Rivertown streets, return this card to the box. Each player draws 1 Spell.
**Fail**: If the terror level reaches 10, return this card to the box. Every investigator is *Cursed*.

mythos.name: Dreams of a Sunken City
text: Investigators cannot gain Sanity except by recieving psychiatric care in Arkham Asylum (or from Carolyn Fen).

mythos.name: Egyptian Exhibit Visits Miskatonic U.
text: Any investigator who ends his movement in the Miskatonic U. streets may pass a **Lore (-1) check** to gain 1 Clue token by reading the strange heiroglyphics on the artifacts in the exhibit.

mythos.name: Estate Sale
text: Investigators who end their movement in the Uptown streets may draw 2 Unique Items and purchase one, none, or both of them at list price, discarding any that are not purchased.

mythos.name: Family Found Butchered!
text: The terror level increased by 1 in light of this tragic news.

mythos.name: Feds Raid Arkham!
text: All monsters in the streets are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Fourth of July Parade!
text: Investigators cannot move into our out of the Merchant Dist. streets until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

mythos.name: Gangs Clean Up Easttown!
text: All the monsters in the Easttown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Ghost Ship Docks by Itself!
text: An ancient ghost ship arrives in Arkham, releasing 2 monsters into the Merchant Dist. streets.

mythos.name: Goat-like Creature Spotted in Woods!
text: All Dark Young in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

mythos.name: Good Work Undone
text: When this card enters play, place 6 Clue tokens on it. Any player may spend Clue tokens during the **Arkham Encounter Phase** while in the Easttown streets to discard Clue tokens from this card on a 1-for-1 basis.
**Ongoing effect**: Roll two dice at the end of every **Myhthos

mythos.name: Happy Days are Here Again
text: Due to the renewed prosperity that has come to Arkham, the terror level cannot increase.

mythos.name: Heate Wave
text: Fight checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty
Lore checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.
Fire Vampires have their tougness increased by 1.

mythos.name: Horror at Groundbreaking!
text: An ancient stone is disturbed by the construction, releaseing 2 monsters into the Miskatonic U. streets.

mythos.name: Icy Conditions
text: Investigators recive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase.

mythos.name: Ill Wind Grips Arkham!
text: The first player must pass a **Luck (-1) check** or be *Cursed*.

mythos.name: Lodge Member Held for Questioning!
text: A Silver Lodge ritual lets 2 monsters loose in the French Hill streets.

mythos.name: Lodge Members Watch the Night!
text: All monsters in the French Hill streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Manhunt in Arkham!
text: All monsters in location are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Merchants March on Crime!
text: All monsters in the Merchant Dist. streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Miskatonic Arctic Expedition Returns!
text: Any Elder Things previously claimed as monster trophies by players return to life and are placed in the River Docks.

mythos.name: Missing People Return!
text: All investigators currently *lost in time and space* immediately return to Arkham, appearing in a street or location of their choice.

mythos.name: No Once Can Help You Now
text: Gate cannot be **sealed**, although they can still be **closed**.

mythos.name: Noden's Favor
text: It costs 2 fewer Clue tokens to **seal** gates.

mythos.name: Picnickers Panic!
text: A careless picnicker unleashes 2 monsters on the Downtown streets.

mythos.name: Planetary Alignment
text: Thanks to the mystic energy generated by the planetary alignment, all spells have a Sanity cost of 0.

mythos.name: Police Step Up Patrols in Northside!
text: All monsters in the Northside streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Private Security Hired in Updtown!
text: All monsters in the Uptown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Raining Cats and Dogs
text: Speed check in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty, and player receive 1 less movement point during the **Movement Phase**.
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus
Return any Fire Vamipires in play to the cup. If a fire Vamipire enters play, return it to the cup and draw a different monster.

mythos.name: Rivertown Residents Take Back Streets!
text: All monsters in Rivertown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: R'yleh Rising
text: Star Spanw and Maniacs have their toughness increased by 1.
The difficulty to **seal** or **close** gates to R'yleh is increased by 1.

mythos.name: Scientist Warns of Dimension Rift!
text: All Dimensional Shamblers and Hounds of Tindalos in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

mythos.name: Sheldon Gang Turns to Police for Aid!
text: The Sheldon Gang disturbs a burial mound, releasing 2 monsters in to the Updtown streets.

mythos.name: Slum Murders Continue!
text: An old basement is opened. releasing 2 monsters into the Easttown streets.

mythos.name: Solar Eclipse
text: Due to the interference of the solar eclipse, no spells may be cast.

mythos.name: Southside Strangler Suspected
text: However, the press is mistaken, and the murders were caused by 2 monsters that are released into the Southside streets.

mythos.name: Strange Lights on Campus!
text: The Library, Administration Building, and Science Building are all closed until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

mythos.name: Strange Power Flux Plagues City!
text: All investigators in Other World aras may immediately return to Arkham.

mythos.name: Strange Tremors Cease!
text: All the Chthonians and Dholes in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

mythos.name: Sunny and Clear
text: Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.
Will checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.
If the Haunter in Darkness is in play, return it to the cup. If the Haunter in Darkness enters play, return it to the cup and draw a difference monster.

mythos.name: Temperence Fever Sweeps City
text: Any investigator with Whiskey must pass a **Sneak (-1) check** or get arrested and take to the Police Station. If this occurs the must discard their Whiskey. In addition, Hibb's Roadhouse is closed until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

mythos.name: Terror at the Train Station!
text: A rusty train arrives in Arkham, disgorgin 2 monsters in the Northside streets

mythos.name: The Chill of the Grave
text: All **Undead** monsters have their toughness increased by 1.

mythos.name: The Festival
text: The festival has begun! Cultists and Byahkee have their toughness increased by 1.

mythos.name: The Great Ritual
text: **Ongoing Effect**: Cultists, Witches, Warlocks, and High Priests have their toughness increased by 2 while this card is in play.
Place 1 Clue token on this card at the end of every **Mythos Phase** (beginning the turn after it entered play).

**Pass**: If a single player discards 3 spells (4 if there are 5 or more players) while in the French HIll streets during the **Arkham Encounters Phase**, return this card to the box. Each player gains 2 Clue tokens.

**Fail**: If there are ever 5 or more Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. From now on, draw 2 mythos cards each **Mythos Phase**. Ignore everything on the first card except for gate opening.

mythos.name: The Man in Black
text: Investigators who end their movment in the French Hill streets may deal with the Man in Black to gain power. They roll dice equal to their current Sanity, and for every failed die, the lose 1 Sanity. If this reduces them to 0 Sanity, they are **devoured** and the player must start a new character. Otherwise, they gain 1 Clue token and draw 1 Spell

mythos.name: The Southside Strangler Strikes
text: **Ongoing Effect**: Return one Ally from the Ally deck to the box box at random at the end of every **Mythos Phase** while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). The Southside Strangler has struck again!
**Pass**: If a single player discards 5 Clue tokens while in Ma's Boarding House during the **Arkham Encounter Phase**, return this card to the box. Each player gains $5 as a reward from the police.

**Fail**: If there are no Allies to return to the box at the end of the **Mythos Phase**, return this card to the box. Each player must lower either their maximum Sanity or Stamina (their choice) by 1 for the rest of the game.

mythos.name: The Stars Are Right
text: **Ongoing Effect**: Roll a die at the end of every **Mythos Phase** while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). On a 1 or 2, place one doom token on the ancient one's doom tack.
**Pass**: If a player discards an Ally card while in the Downtown streets during the **Arkham Encounters Phase**, return this card to the box. Each player draws 2 Common Items.
**Fail**: If the Ancient One awakens, return this card to the box.

mythos.name: The Story Continues...
text: I cannot remember, I **must** not remember what I saw on that dark and foreboding night...
Shuffle the mythos deck, being sure to include this card in it. After the deck is shuffled, draw a new mythos card for the turn.

mythos.name: The Terrible Experiment
text: When this card enter play, place 5 monsters form the cup on it. Any player may choose to fight one or more of these monsters while in the Miskatonic U. streets during the **Arkham Encounter Phase**. If defeated, they are claimed as trophies. These monsters do not move, are not considered to be on the board, and do not count against the monster limit.
**Ongoing Effect**: Place a monster on this card at the end of every **Mythos Phase** (beginning the turn after it entered play.
**Pass**: If there are no monsters on this card, return it to the box. Each player draws 1 skill.
**Fail**: If there are 8 monsters on this card return it to the box. Raise the terror level to 10 and place the monsters that were on it into play in the Miskatonic U. streeets.

mythos.name: Things of Darkness
text: Ghouls, Formless Spawns, Shaggoths, and Flying Polyps have their toughtness increased by 1.

mythos.name: Vigilante Guard the Night!
text: All monsters in the Downtown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

mythos.name: Witch Burning Anniversary!
text: An ancient curse strikes Arkham, releasing 2 monsters in to the Rivertown streets

mythos.name: Songs from the Woods
text: Goat Span, Tcho-tchos, and Dark Young have their toughness increased by 1.
